channel.title: All 317 client crash in 40 seconds [Help]
channel.description:
Ok so when I try to play 317 servers my client crashes in 40-60 seconds. They all work on my other computer which is windows xp. The computer they crash on is vista 64bit. Any ideas why it does this. This is what the cmd prompt says when the error happens. I also have the lastest java and jdk and everything else.
[IMG]http://i340.photobucket.com/albums/o352/Lemonssss/gay.jpg[/img]
Some have a error report heres what it says.
[code]#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

item.title: All 317 client crash in 40 seconds [Help]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

64 Bit java problem.

Read full topic

item.title: All 317 client crash in 40 seconds [Help]

@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

Put these long things in a format please, takes up too much space.

Read full topic

item.title: All 317 client crash in 40 seconds [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Ok so when I try to play 317 servers my client crashes in 40-60 seconds. They all work on my other computer which is windows xp. The computer they crash on is vista 64bit. Any ideas why it does this. This is what the cmd prompt says when the error happens. I also have the lastest java and jdk and everything else.

Some have a error report heres what it says.
